cause.description:
Providing a cost-effective “medical home” for uninsured, medically underserved populations and a gateway to the mainstream health system • Primary and preventive health care, including physical examinations and follow up • Disease management through follow-up visits, medication and health education • Free medications for most patients through donated samples and indigent patient drug programs. Prescriptions are written rarely; many patients lack the ability to pay • Facilitated referrals to specialty health and social services and clinics and patient education programs
For more information go to http://www.rifreeclinic.org/
1. Free Health Care should be given to those who are unisured and cannot afford the services
cause.mission: Rhode Island Free Clinic offers high-quality medical care and preventive health services to individuals who do not have health insurance or cannot afford to purchase those services.
cause.name: RI Free Clinic
